results.title: Angelo Badalamenti, Composer for ‘Twin Peaks,’ Is Dead at 85
results.abstract: The filmmaker David Lynch turned to his haunting work again and again, for “Blue Velvet,” “Mulholland Drive” and other neo-noir films.

results.abstract: In this unsettling moment, comedians, filmmakers, playwrights and others have been struggling against a long-ingrained American response to look away.

results.title: Highbrow Films Aimed at Winning Oscars Are Losing Audiences
results.abstract: The kind of critically praised dramas that often dominate the awards season are falling flat at the box office, failing to justify the money it takes to make them.
